title: Comment
description: A comment in a Sublinks Post attributable to an author.

id.description: The unique identifier for the comment.

post_id.description: The unique identifier of Post comment is for.

author_id.description: The unique identifier for the actor that is the author of the comment. I.E. discuss.online/u/lazyguru

published.description: The date and time the comment was published.

nsfw.description: Whether the comment has sensitive (NSFW) content or not.
